group.description:
This group is for people who want to debate Flat Earth, either for or against.
Rules:
1. No Slander. Debate the topic, not the person.
    (Slander = a malicious, false, and defamatory statement about someone)
2. Keep posts on-topic: This group is about Flat Earth and things related to Flat Earth.


Admin contact: @GroupAdmin

card.description: The Biden Administration is planning to scale back planned regulations that would have cracked down on American investments in China, even despite rising tensions between the two nations.
card.title: Biden Administration Reverses Course on Efforts to Regulate U.S. Investments in China › American Greatness

_source.content: Favoring the CCP & his corrupt American corporate buddies, as always:Biden Administration Reverses Course on Efforts to Regulate U.S. Investments in ChinaBy Eric Lendrum   February 28, 2023The Biden Administration is planning to scale back planned regulations that would have cracked down on American investments in China, even despite rising tensions between the two nations.According to Politico, at least five anonymous sources “with knowledge of the White House discussions” said that Biden will not sign the executive order as originally planned; instead of outright restricting such investments, the new order will instead simply attempt to increase the transparency of such deals....https://amgreatness.com/2023/02/28/biden-administration-reverses-course-on-efforts-to-regulate-u-s-investments-in-china/
_source.contentraw:
Favoring the CCP & his corrupt American corporate buddies, as always:

Biden Administration Reverses Course on Efforts to Regulate U.S. Investments in China

By Eric Lendrum February 28, 2023

The Biden Administration is planning to scale back planned regulations that would have cracked down on American investments in China, even despite rising tensions between the two nations.

According to Politico, at least five anonymous sources “with knowledge of the White House discussions” said that Biden will not sign the executive order as originally planned; instead of outright restricting such investments, the new order will instead simply attempt to increase the transparency of such deals....

https://amgreatness.com/2023/02/28/biden-administration-reverses-course-on-efforts-to-regulate-u-s-investments-in-china/

card.html: <iframe width="200" height="113" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_CxGhEuXcG8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" title="Why Are Doctors Quitting? This Physician Says They Are Demoralized | Amanpour and Company"></iframe>
card.title: Why Are Doctors Quitting? This Physician Says They Are Demoralized | Amanpour and Company

_source.content: Why Are Doctors Quitting? This Physician Says They Are Demoralized!America's doctors are leaving the profession in growing numbers, creating a crisis in the U.S. healthcare system.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_CxGhEuXcG8&embeds_euri=https%3A%2F%2Fgodlike.com%2F&feature=emb_logoSome 117,000 physicians left the field in 2021, and one in five doctors say they will soon do so.In a recent op-ed for The New York Times, political anthropologist and physician Dr. Eric Reinhart explained fatal flaws in the country’s health system that led to this worrying trend. He shares with Michel Martin some potential solutions."Can't happen fast enough. My niece is a pulmonologist .. has effectively killed unknown numbers of "covid" patients with ventilators, remdesivir etc. She knows. But she still does it. A God-fearing Christian woman."90+ % of doctors have thoroughly discredited themselves.What was that about "first, do no harm"?Zero trust left for big pharma toxin pushing doctors.
_source.contentraw:
Why Are Doctors Quitting? This Physician Says They Are Demoralized!



America's doctors are leaving the profession in growing numbers, creating a crisis in the U.S. healthcare system.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_CxGhEuXcG8&embeds_euri=https%3A%2F%2Fgodlike.com%2F&feature=emb_logo

Some 117,000 physicians left the field in 2021, and one in five doctors say they will soon do so.

In a recent op-ed for The New York Times, political anthropologist and physician Dr. Eric Reinhart explained fatal flaws in the country’s health system that led to this worrying trend. He shares with Michel Martin some potential solutions.

"Can't happen fast enough. My niece is a pulmonologist .. has effectively killed unknown numbers of "covid" patients with ventilators, remdesivir etc. She knows. But she still does it. A God-fearing Christian woman."

90+ % of doctors have thoroughly discredited themselves.
What was that about "first, do no harm"?

Zero trust left for big pharma toxin pushing doctors.

card.title: Download - Utopia P2P Ecosystem

_source.content: WhatsApp user accidentally hijacked someone else's account without hackingA stranger can read your private WhatsApp messages and send messages to all your contacts if you have changed your phone number and have not deleted the WhatsApp account associated with the old one.Eric was a long-time WhatsApp user in Switzerland, and his account was linked to his Swiss phone number. All this time he was using WhatsApp, which continued to send and receive messages as usual, not knowing about the phone number change.At the end of the same month, he changed his WhatsApp phone number, after which everything went wrong.Eric reported the problem to WhatsApp and the parent company Meta, and was told that it was a problem with an oversold phone number, and not an error typical of WhatsApp. Meta acknowledged that "this is a concern," but Eric was told that such a vulnerability does not meet the criteria of the error detection reward program.However, according to Eric, WhatsApp can take steps to reduce the severity of the problem, for example, regularly checking the correctness of the user's phone number.That is, the messenger is built in such a way that anyone who purchased a SIM card with a number previously registered in the WhatsApp system can access the correspondence of the previous owner. The new owner of the number is protected, but the old one, if less than 45 days have passed since he last used the application on any device, is not protected at all. While working on the messenger, someone did not think through this issue very well. And we certainly didn't think at all about how this already very illusory privacy protection would work after the strict binding of the messenger to the active SIM card was removed for the sake of competition with Telegram. In general, the only reliable way to protect your data in WhatsApp is not to store your data in WhatsApp and use a reliable and decentralized Utopia P2P ecosystem. It will protect all chats and conversations and ensures users’ privacy.Download and appreciate the security and protection of your data in the online space: https://u.is/en/download.html#WhatsApp #UtopiaP2P #security #privacy #messenger #dataleaks
_source.contentraw:
WhatsApp user accidentally hijacked someone else's account without hacking

A stranger can read your private WhatsApp messages and send messages to all your contacts if you have changed your phone number and have not deleted the WhatsApp account associated with the old one.

Eric was a long-time WhatsApp user in Switzerland, and his account was linked to his Swiss phone number. All this time he was using WhatsApp, which continued to send and receive messages as usual, not knowing about the phone number change.

At the end of the same month, he changed his WhatsApp phone number, after which everything went wrong.

Eric reported the problem to WhatsApp and the parent company Meta, and was told that it was a problem with an oversold phone number, and not an error typical of WhatsApp.

Meta acknowledged that "this is a concern," but Eric was told that such a vulnerability does not meet the criteria of the error detection reward program.

However, according to Eric, WhatsApp can take steps to reduce the severity of the problem, for example, regularly checking the correctness of the user's phone number.

That is, the messenger is built in such a way that anyone who purchased a SIM card with a number previously registered in the WhatsApp system can access the correspondence of the previous owner. The new owner of the number is protected, but the old one, if less than 45 days have passed since he last used the application on any device, is not protected at all.

While working on the messenger, someone did not think through this issue very well. And we certainly didn't think at all about how this already very illusory privacy protection would work after the strict binding of the messenger to the active SIM card was removed for the sake of competition with Telegram.

In general, the only reliable way to protect your data in WhatsApp is not to store your data in WhatsApp and use a reliable and decentralized Utopia P2P ecosystem. It will protect all chats and conversations and ensures users’ privacy.

Download and appreciate the security and protection of your data in the online space: https://u.is/en/download.html

#WhatsApp #UtopiaP2P #security #privacy #messenger #dataleaks

_source.content: Military Arrests Gates Foundation MembersByMichael Baxter -February 27, 20231153781United States Special Forces this weekend arrested two senior members of the still operational Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, CEO Mark Suzman and CFO Carolyn Ainslie on charges of possession of child pornography, child endangerment, and child trafficking, sources in General Eric M. Smith’s office told Real Raw News.The Gates Foundation took a heavy blow in September 2021, when the U.S. Navy Judge Advocate General’s Corps hanged eugenicist and pedophile Bill Gates in a gruesome execution. The White Hat partition of the U.S. military seized a sizable portion of Gates’ domestic assets, including several properties, then liquidated them for redistribution to families whose lives Gates had all but destroyed. Soon afterward, the military arrested Gates’ estranged ex-wife Melinda, who turned out to be actor Kevin Kline in drag. He told investigators that he was a gender-reassigned flaming homosexual and that Gates had ordered the murder of the real Melinda because she was an “incessant, niggling nag” who couldn’t satisfy Bill’s perverted desires. He also said Bill had hired several other transvestites to portray Melinda, but had them executed, too, for not meeting his sexually deviant needs. Kline was eventually charged as a co-conspirator, but his military tribunal has been perpetually delayed, as he has assisted the military identify and pin down criminal members of the Gates foundation.He has reportedly been living in a cushy GITMO cell in exchange for his cooperation.Our source said the military put the Gates issue on hold following Bill’s execution, as it was pursuing despots in the criminal Biden regime. In January, after Gen. Smith assumed command, Navy investigators revisited Kline, who said his arrest and Bill’s death hadn’t stopped the Foundation from earning billions of bucks trafficking children. Despite his imprisonment, Kline had an uncanny knowledge of current power shuffles within the Foundation, and he implored investigators to look rigorously at Suzman and Ainslie, citing their “pedophilic tendencies.”U.S. Army Cyber Command and Marine Corps Forces Cyberspace Command penetrated their work and home computers and found the unthinkable—obscene images of children and ads written to pawn them to the highest bidders overseas. Suzman’s home PC had 500,000 photos and videos of prepubescent kids in compromising positions, and Ainslie’s had worse: the most graphically inappropriate photos imaginable, showing young girls “entertaining “older men.One Cyber Command analyst vomited upon seeing a specific image and requested a leave of absence. It showed a portly masked man holding a pistol to a girl’s temple as she performed oral sex. Other images were equally disturbing, prompting JAG to seal the evidence until the despicable duo answers to a military tribunal.On Saturday, Special Forces arrested Suzman at his palatial mansion in Redmond, Washington, where he was fornicating with two underage males high on ketamine, a dissociative anesthetic used medically for induction and maintenance of anesthesia. It is also used as a recreational drug.Suzman was apparently stoned on PCP and exhibited superhuman strength for a nerdy 51-year-old guy. He flung aside two Special Forces operators and fell unconscious only after 15 Taser darts struck his chest. Special Forces found a 25-gram bag of phenyl cyclohexyl piperidine, or angel dust, on a nightstand. The underage boys, our source said, were so “spaced out” they thought their liberators were U.S. Army recruiters who had come to conscript them to fight against Vladmir Putin in Ukraine. Suzman was put in cuffs and taken to a military processing center, while the kids were placed in protective custody until their parents or legal guardians could be found.On Sunday, Special Forces captured Ainslie at her Seattle home. According to our source, she acted like a “Karen,” rebuking the arrest because no female officer was present to frisk her. The officer in charge told her he didn’t abide political correctness as he found a .32 pistol tucked in a thigh holster under her dress. When told she’d be sent to GITMO, Ainslie yelped, “No, no, this is not supposed to happen.”“We’ve got two more, but not enough. We’re talking about the most morally depraved people on earth, and they must face justice, real justice. It’s unbelievable how many Satanic pedos are out there, operating in the open. They’re corrosive. They have evil in their eyes. And eventually we’ll get them all,” our source said in closing.
_source.contentraw:
Military Arrests Gates Foundation Members
By
Michael Baxter -
February 27, 2023
115
3781

United States Special Forces this weekend arrested two senior members of the still operational Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, CEO Mark Suzman and CFO Carolyn Ainslie on charges of possession of child pornography, child endangerment, and child trafficking, sources in General Eric M. Smith’s office told Real Raw News.

The Gates Foundation took a heavy blow in September 2021, when the U.S. Navy Judge Advocate General’s Corps hanged eugenicist and pedophile Bill Gates in a gruesome execution. The White Hat partition of the U.S. military seized a sizable portion of Gates’ domestic assets, including several properties, then liquidated them for redistribution to families whose lives Gates had all but destroyed. Soon afterward, the military arrested Gates’ estranged ex-wife Melinda, who turned out to be actor Kevin Kline in drag. He told investigators that he was a gender-reassigned flaming homosexual and that Gates had ordered the murder of the real Melinda because she was an “incessant, niggling nag” who couldn’t satisfy Bill’s perverted desires. He also said Bill had hired several other transvestites to portray Melinda, but had them executed, too, for not meeting his sexually deviant needs. Kline was eventually charged as a co-conspirator, but his military tribunal has been perpetually delayed, as he has assisted the military identify and pin down criminal members of the Gates foundation.

He has reportedly been living in a cushy GITMO cell in exchange for his cooperation.

Our source said the military put the Gates issue on hold following Bill’s execution, as it was pursuing despots in the criminal Biden regime. In January, after Gen. Smith assumed command, Navy investigators revisited Kline, who said his arrest and Bill’s death hadn’t stopped the Foundation from earning billions of bucks trafficking children. Despite his imprisonment, Kline had an uncanny knowledge of current power shuffles within the Foundation, and he implored investigators to look rigorously at Suzman and Ainslie, citing their “pedophilic tendencies.”

U.S. Army Cyber Command and Marine Corps Forces Cyberspace Command penetrated their work and home computers and found the unthinkable—obscene images of children and ads written to pawn them to the highest bidders overseas. Suzman’s home PC had 500,000 photos and videos of prepubescent kids in compromising positions, and Ainslie’s had worse: the most graphically inappropriate photos imaginable, showing young girls “entertaining “older men.

One Cyber Command analyst vomited upon seeing a specific image and requested a leave of absence. It showed a portly masked man holding a pistol to a girl’s temple as she performed oral sex. Other images were equally disturbing, prompting JAG to seal the evidence until the despicable duo answers to a military tribunal.

On Saturday, Special Forces arrested Suzman at his palatial mansion in Redmond, Washington, where he was fornicating with two underage males high on ketamine, a dissociative anesthetic used medically for induction and maintenance of anesthesia. It is also used as a recreational drug.

Suzman was apparently stoned on PCP and exhibited superhuman strength for a nerdy 51-year-old guy. He flung aside two Special Forces operators and fell unconscious only after 15 Taser darts struck his chest. Special Forces found a 25-gram bag of phenyl cyclohexyl piperidine, or angel dust, on a nightstand. The underage boys, our source said, were so “spaced out” they thought their liberators were U.S. Army recruiters who had come to conscript them to fight against Vladmir Putin in Ukraine. Suzman was put in cuffs and taken to a military processing center, while the kids were placed in protective custody until their parents or legal guardians could be found.

On Sunday, Special Forces captured Ainslie at her Seattle home. According to our source, she acted like a “Karen,” rebuking the arrest because no female officer was present to frisk her. The officer in charge told her he didn’t abide political correctness as he found a .32 pistol tucked in a thigh holster under her dress. When told she’d be sent to GITMO, Ainslie yelped, “No, no, this is not supposed to happen.”

“We’ve got two more, but not enough. We’re talking about the most morally depraved people on earth, and they must face justice, real justice. It’s unbelievable how many Satanic pedos are out there, operating in the open. They’re corrosive. They have evil in their eyes. And eventually we’ll get them all,” our source said in closing.

card.title: Strong's Greek: 509. ἄνωθεν (anóthen) -- from above

_source.content: @Stan_Arney These passages basically parallel Matthew 7:21-23 and 2 Timothy 3:5. Those are both stellar descriptions of cults. They match the ones listed in the posting.Some side notes: A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not the Gospel message (1 John 3:23, 1 John 5:10). Those born again will automatically “remain” in Jesus.By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, God The Father changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. A person ultimately only affects him or herself and forever’s a long time. We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law.Out of MANY so far, haven’t met a Roman Catholic YET who is able to correctly answer the ONE question guaranteed to give that person confidence on the Day of Judgment if heartfelt as is implied in 1 John 4:17 and to save him/her from that “second death” as Revelation 21:8 puts it while an incorrect answer guarantees the polar opposite of confidence on the Day of Judgment. Instead, sadly, it will be a matter of one “shrinking back and being destroyed” as Hebrews 10:19 implies. There's a HUGE difference between a ROMAN Catholic church and a HOLY Catholic church which is the reason for the Great Schism of 1054. Eastern Orthodoxy ended up siding with the HOLY Catholic church while Western Orthodoxy sided with ROMAN Catholic church (see also Nicene Creed for more information). I personally like how this one priest in Alaska put it once: “Yeah, but I don’t want any of that ‘Rome’ stuff.”There are –ONLY– four basic criteria from Jesus which equal salvation if given correctly while one giving them incorrectly equals no salvation. What were they again? Someone born again (or “born from above” – or “born anew” – John 3:1-6 – https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) can answer them eventually while someone either not born again or in a cult or a false religion cannot, unfortunately. Scripture references are nice but not mandatory. The principles, on the other hand, those are MOST critical.) That’s quite important to answer since forever’s a long time. Thanks in advance!(Fill-in-the-blank time...LOL!)(One is already listed but there are 3 more.) (Exact verses are not necessary. The concepts, however, are crucial. Forever’s a long time.)(Actually, never mind. They simply avoid the question. That says something. The reason why it’s always avoided is because they do not have the ability to fill in the blank. Instead of going around and around and around and around and around and around that “avoidance” flagpole again, will instead provide the answer.)A: Mark 1:15, John 3:1-6, John 14:6, John 19:30. Again...ONLY.Those are naturally followed by Jesus’ Resurrection (Matthew 28:6, John 14:19b, Hebrews 7:23-25).(See Romans 5:10 and Galatians 2:19-21 for more information. Lest anyone forget that we are FORGIVEN through Calvary (John 19:30) but it’s His life which SAVES.)(That “no ability to answer” scenario is actually tragic because that’s a lot of individuals.)LOTS and LOTS of idolatry in Roman Catholicism. (That’s fancy talk for “LOTS and LOTS of Hebrew Roots Movement in Roman Catholicism.”) Sad. Roman Catholicism along with HRM are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking. Can only recommend for an individual’s sake alone that repentance is reached and that “Roman Catholicism” stuff is IMMEDIATELY abandoned. Somebody attempting to blend the Torah and Calvary is basically wasting your time. They do not blend. (Also see Matthew 9:16, Mark 2:22 and Romans 5:10 for more information.)
_source.contentraw:
@Stan_Arney These passages basically parallel Matthew 7:21-23 and 2 Timothy 3:5. Those are both stellar descriptions of cults. They match the ones listed in the posting.
Some side notes: A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not the Gospel message (1 John 3:23, 1 John 5:10). Those born again will automatically “remain” in Jesus.
By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, God The Father changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. A person ultimately only affects him or herself and forever’s a long time. We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law.
Out of MANY so far, haven’t met a Roman Catholic YET who is able to correctly answer the ONE question guaranteed to give that person confidence on the Day of Judgment if heartfelt as is implied in 1 John 4:17 and to save him/her from that “second death” as Revelation 21:8 puts it while an incorrect answer guarantees the polar opposite of confidence on the Day of Judgment. Instead, sadly, it will be a matter of one “shrinking back and being destroyed” as Hebrews 10:19 implies. There's a HUGE difference between a ROMAN Catholic church and a HOLY Catholic church which is the reason for the Great Schism of 1054. Eastern Orthodoxy ended up siding with the HOLY Catholic church while Western Orthodoxy sided with ROMAN Catholic church (see also Nicene Creed for more information). I personally like how this one priest in Alaska put it once: “Yeah, but I don’t want any of that ‘Rome’ stuff.”

There are –ONLY– four basic criteria from Jesus which equal salvation if given correctly while one giving them incorrectly equals no salvation. What were they again? Someone born again (or “born from above” – or “born anew” – John 3:1-6 – https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) can answer them eventually while someone either not born again or in a cult or a false religion cannot, unfortunately. Scripture references are nice but not mandatory. The principles, on the other hand, those are MOST critical.) That’s quite important to answer since forever’s a long time. Thanks in advance!
(Fill-in-the-blank time...LOL!)
(One is already listed but there are 3 more.) (Exact verses are not necessary. The concepts, however, are crucial. Forever’s a long time.)

(Actually, never mind. They simply avoid the question. That says something. The reason why it’s always avoided is because they do not have the ability to fill in the blank. Instead of going around and around and around and around and around and around that “avoidance” flagpole again, will instead provide the answer.)
A: Mark 1:15, John 3:1-6, John 14:6, John 19:30. Again...ONLY.
Those are naturally followed by Jesus’ Resurrection (Matthew 28:6, John 14:19b, Hebrews 7:23-25).
(See Romans 5:10 and Galatians 2:19-21 for more information. Lest anyone forget that we are FORGIVEN through Calvary (John 19:30) but it’s His life which SAVES.)

(That “no ability to answer” scenario is actually tragic because that’s a lot of individuals.)

LOTS and LOTS of idolatry in Roman Catholicism. (That’s fancy talk for “LOTS and LOTS of Hebrew Roots Movement in Roman Catholicism.”) Sad. Roman Catholicism along with HRM are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking. Can only recommend for an individual’s sake alone that repentance is reached and that “Roman Catholicism” stuff is IMMEDIATELY abandoned. Somebody attempting to blend the Torah and Calvary is basically wasting your time. They do not blend. (Also see Matthew 9:16, Mark 2:22 and Romans 5:10 for more information.)
